resources.string: Zeige einen Floating Action Button unten rechts auf dem Bildschirm an.
Passe die Navigationsleiste durch Entfernen von ungenutzten Einträgen an.
This turns on the Folio Toolbar.
Only use the Facebook Bar. Please turn off the Folio Toolbar first.
Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.
Tap OK to clear Folio\'s data. This will also log you out.
Clear Folio\'s data. This will also log you out.
Open external links in Chrome Custom Tabs?
Reduce data usage by removing images.
Tap here to read more about the licences used in Folio.
For launcher icons for Folio & Folio Messenger. Also some navigation drawer icons. Also help with development on portions of the original app FrontPage. Tap here to visit his website.
For sharing an interest in technology and being patient while daddy worked.
For being supportive and encouraging throughout the past years. Thanks for letting me borrow the laptop.
For their new graph api. Also for their mobile site which is used in Folio.
For AppCompat v7, also for open sourcing your Material Design icons.
Tap to help translate Folio into your language.
Awe snap! That\'s an error. Folio couldn\'t get your notifications. Please close and reopen Folio.
Show Folio\'s Notification QuickBar to open a floating window for your favorite network.
Secure Folio with a lock code
